name: Avestruzii
description: The Avestruzii is a robust medium humanoid with a strong constitution, wearing scale mail. It is armed with a battleaxe and has claw attacks as well as a shortbow for ranged engagements.
memorable: The ability to react defensively and mitigate damage with its 'Dig In' reaction makes the Avestruzii stand out on the battlefield.
goals: Typically engaged in combat, the Avestruzii aims to hold the front line and protect allies.
relations: May be encountered alongside other humanoids or serve under stronger leaders.
environment: Commonly found in various terrains, particularly in areas where humanoid factions gather.
strengths: High constitution provides excellent resilience in combat.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma hinder social and tactical interactions.
attacks: Employs a versatile battleaxe for melee attacks, has claw attacks for quick strikes, and uses a shortbow for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Dig In' reaction allows the Avestruzii to resist a melee attack, enhancing its defensive capabilities.
senses: Passive perception of 12 indicates average awareness of surroundings.
skills: Possesses average perception, without any notable skill proficiencies.
additional_information: Good physical strength with a +2 modifier to strength.
Capable of dealing slashing damage with multiple attack options.
Can engage both in melee and ranged combat effectively.
Resilience makes it a challenging opponent for less experienced adventurers.
